GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.38 to before v5.10.155
GSD.description:
nilfs2: fix deadlock in nilfs_count_free_blocks()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.155 by commit 1d4ff73062096c21b47954d2996b4df259777bda, it was introduced in version v2.6.38 by commit e828949e5b42bfd234ee537cdb7c5e3a577958a3. For more details please see the references link.
